title: Police raid Girona polling station, people injured
description:
(1 Oct 2017) Spanish riot police smashed their way into a polling station near the Catalan city of Girona on Sunday.
Civil Guard riot police with shields used a hammer to smash the glass of the front door of the voting centre and lock cutters to force their way in. 
Scuffles erupted outside between police and people waiting to vote at the polling centre in Sant Julia de Ramis. 
The Spanish government has ordered police to stop the voting process, saying it was illegal.
Catalan officials said 38 people were treated for mostly minor injuries across the region.
